item.title: MIUI V12.5.9.0.RKXCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 5 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 5 China

Codename: nabu

Version: V12.5.9.0.RKXCNXM | 11.0

Size: 3.9 GB

MD5: 738def3dd342aa92950cc117835b4394

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Updated Android Security Patch to August 2021. Increased system security.
Optimization: Resource-intensive games can now work in the background
[IME]
Optimization: Selection menu for the custom keyboard
[Stylus & keyboard]
Optimization: Stylus connectivity
[Other]
Fix: Wi-Fi connection abnormalities

Download: Here
